data.name: checkErrorLastAdmin
data.value: Unable to check if the user is the last administrator of his entity
data.comment: Custom error message when checking if the user is the last administrator of his entity

data.name: dataDeleteEntityNewApplicationUsedError
data.value: Error deleting the {0}, some users are still attached to this application
data.comment: Custom error message when removing a entity new application still used by some users

data.name: dataDeleteError
data.value: Unable to delete the {0}
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataDeleteErrorEntityUsers
data.value: Failed to delete Entity: some users still belong to this entity
data.comment: Custom error message when an entity is deleted and still have users

data.name: dataDeleteLastEntityAdministrator
data.value: This is the last user administrator of his entity. Are you sure to delete this user?
data.comment: Custom error message when the last administrator of an entity is about to be deleted

data.name: dataDeleteSuccess
data.value: {0} deleted with success
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataDeleteUserSuccess
data.value: User successfully deleted from database
data.comment: Custom error message when a user is removed from database and from AD

data.name: dataErrorEntityBusinessTypeNone
data.value: The Business Type must be different than NONE
data.comment: Custom error message when an entity is set with the business type "NONE"

data.name: dataErrorEntityBusinessTypeValidityEndDate
data.value: If the Business Type is Prospect, the validity end date must be filled
data.comment: Custom error message when an entity is set with the business type to "PROSPECT" and there is no validity end date

data.name: dataErrorEntityCrmCode
data.value: Unable to update the Entity. CRM code already used
data.comment: Custom error message when an entity already have the same CRM Code

data.name: dataErrorEntityName
data.value: Unable to update the Entity. The company name is already used
data.comment: Custom error message when an entity already have the same company name

data.name: dataErrorFrequencyNotSelected
data.value: Frequency must be selected if a notification is checked
data.comment: Custom error message when a notification is selected but no frequency

data.name: dataErrorUserAccessRightsInteractionWithATR
data.value: Interact with ATR access is allowed only if the user have My Requests Status Access
data.comment: Custom error message when inserting Interaction with ATR access is set while My Request Status access is not

data.name: dataErrorUserLastAdmin
data.value: Unable to remove the last user administrator of the Entity
data.comment: Custom error message when a user is no longer administrator of an entity and it was the last administrator of this entity

data.name: dataImageUploadFormatError
data.value: The uploaded image must have a .jpg, .jpeg or .png format
data.comment: Error message for incorrect uploaded image format

data.name: dataImageUploadSizeError
data.value: Please select a file smaller than 16 Ko
data.comment: Error message for incorrect uploaded image size

data.name: dataIncorrectEmail
data.value: The Email address is incorrect
data.comment: Error message for email address incorrect format

data.name: dataIncorrectPhoneNumber
data.value: The {0} is incorrect
data.comment: Error message for Phone / Fax number incorrect format

data.name: dataInsertError
data.value: Failed to insert the {0}
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataInsertErrorEntityApplicationAccess
data.value: Failed to insert the {0}: Entity must have My Request Status Access before adding Interaction With ATR access
data.comment: Custom error message when inserting Interaction with ATR access is set before adding My Request Status access

data.name: dataInsertErrorEntityWarehouse
data.value: Failed to insert the {0}: No checkbox selected
data.comment: Custom error message when inserting an entity warehouse without checking any checkboxes

data.name: dataInsertErrorUserAD
data.value: Unable to create the user account in the AD. Unable to update user.
data.comment: Custom error message when adding a user in Active directory

data.name: dataInsertSuccess
data.value: {0} inserted with success
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataLengthError
data.value: {0} cannot be longer than {1} characters
data.comment: Data name and length in parameters

data.name: dataLoadError
data.value: Unable to load {0}
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataMandatoryFrequencyError
data.value: The Frequency is required if a Notification is selected
data.comment: Custom error message when selecting a notification for the user new application but no frequency

data.name: dataNotFoundError
data.value: cannot find the {0} (id={1}) in the database
data.comment: Date name and data id in parameters

data.name: dataRequiredError
data.value: The {0} is required
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataUpdateError
data.value: Unable to update the {0}
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: dataUpdateErrorEntityApplicationAccess
data.value: Unabled to update the {0}: Entity must have My Request Status Access before adding Interaction With ATR access
data.comment: Custom error message when updating Interaction with ATR access is set before adding My Request Status access

data.name: dataUpdateErrorEntityUserAdmin
data.value: Unable to update the {0}: No user admin is set, cannot edit the entity
data.comment: Custom error message when updating an entity that doesn't have admin users

data.name: dataUpdateSuccess
data.value: {0} updated with success
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: empty
data.value: {0} is empty
data.comment: Name in parameter

data.name: formInsertError
data.value: Error getting add form for new {0}
data.comment: Data name in parameter

data.name: formUpdateError
data.value: Error getting edit form for new {0} (id={1})
data.comment: Date name and data id in parameters

data.name: modelNotValid
data.value: The model is not valid

data.name: notDefined
data.value: {0} not defined
data.comment: Name in parameter

data.name: numberGroupNotValid
data.value: The number of groups requested is higher than the number of groups possible.

data.name: versionNotValid
data.value: The version entered is not valid

data.name: dataExcelFileUploadFormatError
data.value: The uploaded file must have a .xlsx format
data.comment: Error message for incorrect uploaded file format

data.name: dataPdfFileUploadFormatError
data.value: The uploaded file must have a .pdf format
data.comment: Error message for incorrect uploaded file format

data.name: userNotAllowedToUpdate
data.value: You are not allowed to update the user
data.comment: Error message when a user is not an administrator of the entity of the user that is updated

data.name: dataUpdateErrorRightsDependency
data.value: You cannot grant {0} rights if {1} is not selected
data.comment: Error message when a user update application rights without checkin the mandatory right

data.name: dataUpdateErrorRightNbUser
data.value: you cannot define more than {0} validated users as {1}
data.comment: Error message when a user add more rights than the ones expected for specific rights

data.name: dataForbiddenSuperiorInferiorCharaters
data.value: Characters '<' and '>' are not allowed
data.comment: Prevent HTML injection

data.name: updateBaseErrorMessage
data.value: Unable to update the {0}: {1}
data.comment: Error message when an error occured during the mys update {0} = the object to be update (user or company), {1} = the error that occured

data.name: acknowledgmentSuccess
data.value: All the selected documents have been acknowledged
data.comment: Success Message when all documents have been acknowledged

data.name: dataErrorRemoveUserFromGroupAD
data.value: Unable to remove user from {0} group in the AD. Unable to update user.
data.comment: Error when a user can't be added to the AD Group of the Business Type

data.name: dataErrorAddUserToGroupAD
data.value: Unable to add user to {0} group in the AD. Unable to update user.
data.comment: Error when a user can't be added to the AD Group of the Support Center

data.name: dataUpdateUserAD
data.value: Unable to update user's informations in AD
data.comment: Error when user's informations can't be updated in AD.

data.name: dataGetSearchError
data.value: Unable to find the search form for {0}
data.comment: Error message raised while trying to get the search form

data.name: dataSearchError
data.value: Unable to search data for {0}
data.comment: Error message raised when an error occured during the search

data.name: dataUploadSuccess
data.value: Data uploaded with success
data.comment: Message displayed when data have been successfully uploaded

data.name: dataUploadError
data.value: Unable to upload data for {0}
data.comment: Error message when an error occurs while uploading data

data.name: excelFormatError
data.value: The uploaded file must have an excel file format (.xls or .xlsx)
data.comment: Error message when the file uploaded is not an excel file format

data.name: isOnlyWhiteSpaceError
data.value: No only white space allowed
data.comment: Error when data contains only whitespaces
